com.ss12.camacc.service

Class Accessibility_Service

  • java.lang.Object
    • AccessibilityService
      • com.ss12.camacc.service.Accessibility_Service

  • public class Accessibility_Service
extends AccessibilityService
    Connects to the AccessibilityService that is built into the phone and makes use of it. If the service is off, the application uses it's built in textToSpeech. If the service is on, the application uses the AccessibilityService and turns off textToSpeech.
